main.formDescription: Welcome, from this page you can send a description of the menu that is served at your restaurant. Once sent SoundFood s.r.l. will take care of your request by creating the tailor-made soundtrack for your dishes.
main.formDescription2: The menu must have a name, the description is optional. Keep in mind that the more detailed the information, the greater the affinity between the music and the dishes.
main.formDescription3: The menu is made up of a list of courses, pressing the "Add" button in the area below will open a dialogue box to create a new description for a course on the menu. Each course can be described from different aspects: tastes (more or less simple), colours, shapes, consistencies, temperature and emotional aspect. Even the textual description of the dish is not mandatory (but it is still recommended to include it).
